website_summaries.verdict: If you want the most lock for your money, the $150 August Smart Lock is still your best bet, but if you're really into being able to knock on your phone to unlock your door, Candy House has got just the lock for you.
pros: The Sesame is reasonably priced and easy to install, and has a fun knock-to-unlock feature for iOS devices
cons: The Sesame doesn't work natively with Google Assistant, Amazon Alexa or Siri, and more feature-rich competition is available for just a few dollars more

customer_reviews.title: Works great! EASY to install!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. It was definitely easy to install. It sometimes takes a few seconds for the app to connect but I have had no problems so far. I live in a condo with master keyed locks for our management company, so I didn’t have the option to swap out the lock for something like the August Locks. Was worried this wouldn’t be strong enough but it works great every time. I love having the history on the app even for when the lock is manually locked and unlocked. Great price! I just placed an order for the WiFi adapter so might update after I receive that!
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle

customer_reviews.title: Works well and the app is MUCH faster than the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well and the app is MUCH faster than the Kevo. However, I have never been able to get the auto open function to work and the knock, knock function works about 10% of the time. Additionally, the product is bulky, kinda ugly and feels cheap. But if you need a smartlock without replacing your current lock, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: gogogadget

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with ALL locks.
customer_reviews.text: The Sesame Lock is a great concept, and it does for over most deadbolts. With that being said, it does for over my deadbolt, I have one of the deadbolts that has a vertical pin that connects with the wall. And it worked....sort of. It worked for locking and unlocking the door with the Sesame. But when I lock/unlock my door with the key, it doesn't turn the knob, which in turn means that the Sesame gets confused and thinks the lock is still locked when it's really unlocked. That's not a fault of Sesame, but I still am not able to use it properly.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Z.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Rented Apartments/Condo
customer_reviews.text: Easy peasy install out the box and app set up is on point. Only get this for temporary solutions, find other smart locks if you on the property or have an independent bolt lock. Gave it a 4 star because I hate when companies nickle and dime. This device needs a WiFi adapter in the box, not sold separately. Bluetooth works great but WiFi will enable lock/unlock outside of Bluetooth range. So Sesame, you get a 1 star knocked off. Sell a complete package in the future
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: The 1st Sesame I got was defective and after getting in touch with support they sent me the replacement one (a note here that I had better luck contacting support by direct email rather than via Amazon). It just arrived and works like a charm! It cannot be beaten if you leave in a rented apartment and cannot modify the lock itself. It can be connected with Apple HomeKit via Homebridge.
customer_reviews.author: Borys

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: This was difficult to get to work. Once I got it working, I was super happy with it. Then it quit working. The product support is horrible. There is no phone number, only an email and they don't respond for days. I had to upgrade my wifi router, and once I did that, neither bluetooth nor the wifi would not work at all. I spent days trying to get this figured out with email exchanges from Candyhouse and my internet company. Then Candyhouse refused to refund me because I purchased it through Amazon. Save yourself a lot of hassle and get a different product that works!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina  Stringer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little unit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and works good. I just ordered the wifi adapter!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Simple Life
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy install, easy to use Cons: Battery life is not good enough. Manufacture says 'the batteries are good for 5000 actions' but probably it is not. I changed original battery after 2 months use.(10 actions per day uses) Auto unlock feature not working properly-it sometimes works. *Update* Candy House sent me new Sesame lock for replacement. I hope this works better.
customer_reviews.author: DAE KIM

customer_reviews.title: Great for single women!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Sesame for a year now. As a widow who often comes home alone at night not having to fumbles with keys makes me feel safe.and when I have my hands full it's wonderful to have the door unlock. I love this!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. O'halloran

customer_reviews.title: It’s a SCAM
customer_reviews.text: DON’T BUY THIS PRODUCT. ITS A WASTE OF MONEY!!!! I bought mine few months back and it broker few weeks later. I’ve contacted support and after emailing each other they decided to send me a new lock. Sounds good right? Well, no cause that lock never came and support no longer response to my emails. Honestly stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this product for our apartment main door. It fits perfectly and it has been working flawlessly for a few months now. It's super useful for apartment dwellers and people and don't want to change the actual lock. It sits right on top of the existing lock. My wife lose the auto lock feature. It automatically locks the door as soon as it is closed again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: sometimes annoying. NB
customer_reviews.text: very simple hardware installation, some issue was with integration of the wi-fi adapter, but it was solved after interaction with support team (fast and competent). A long long long spell of connectivity with android and apple devices, sometimes annoying. NB! if you want to use it with Alexa you need to create only (!) an account in their system and couldn't use one of a third side.
customer_reviews.author: Maxim B

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted but would not buy again. Never great.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, but very slow to connect. I was never able to walk up to the door and it unlock without waiting for a connection. Have had it installed and using for 5 months and the internal bracket that adjusts out has broken off rendering the device useless. Removed and back to just using a key until i find a superior product to replace this one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Make any dead bolt smart
customer_reviews.text: Feels cheap but should work in almost any lock that is functioning smoothly with out resistance. Tested with iOS 13 and Apple Watch.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: JUST AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant design and invention. EXCELLENT customer service, had a few issues and they resolved very quickly and were very responsive. Works great with my iPhone and other devices. Love the remote access feature and using the wi-fi module, also allows guest access. Highly recommend ++
customer_reviews.author: Chris W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for living in Apartments!!!
customer_reviews.text: Quite possibly one of the easiest things to install period. I live in an apartment and we have master keyed doors for maintenance. I can't use any of the normal computer locked stuff but this is amazing. Having something like this works beautifully for apartment living especially since leaving my keys at home is amazing for jogging.
customer_reviews.author: TheNetwork

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy w/o $70 wifi adapter
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy again. The product is good at locking and unlocking a deadbolt, but without the $70 wifi adapter you can't remotely unlock the door for guests, which for me is the main selling point of a smart Lock without an external unlocking interface. I guess wifi eats too much battery.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: They stop working!! Mine was dead at 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. It stopped working at 5 months! I changed the battery ...the same. I will call them for a refund or an exchange, at least. This things don’t last
customer_reviews.author: Estibalitz

customer_reviews.title: Great smart lock, the only one on the market that installs over existing lock
customer_reviews.text: I chose this lock because it's the only smart lock that works for the door to my apartment since I cannot modify the existing deadbolt at all. Great device!
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: It just works, dead simple install
customer_reviews.text: Well, Sesame succeeded where the others failed, no need to replace anything, so simple, works on a linked mortise deadlock where pushing down the handle inside opens the deadbolt. I'm so happy, great design.
customer_reviews.author: Benoit M.

customer_reviews.title: Fits more locks than other over-the-handle options.
customer_reviews.text: It’s the only one that would fit my weird door lock. Thank goodness for this option. It has an unusually wide and deep gripper to hold the odd shape fancy deadbolt handle - well done.
customer_reviews.author: J. K.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty and Irritating
customer_reviews.text: Everytime I hit the unlock/lock button it won't work till I hit it again and sometimes a third time. App is not as diverse as it was advertised to be but still functional. Update it has been 2 months of use I am now having to hit the unlock button 3-4 times before it actually unlocks the door. VERY displeased with this product and how it performs compared to the videos about it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Upstair Master Suite Sesame Lock
customer_reviews.text: Performs as expected. Since the door does not have the deadbolt, i modified the key fit the the Sesame Lock slot. Thanks to Alexa integration i don't need to get up from my bed to open the door for my helpers anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Smart Lock
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation and works reliably, despite our door lock which requires significant force to close.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Duller

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful product that can update almost any old school deadbolt ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product that can update almost any old school deadbolt lock. It is a wonderful product and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work...
customer_reviews.text: overall the product itself didn't feel very well made. even after install the product wouldn't work and would only partially turn the deadbolt while the hardware itself made a full rotation. basically didn't function as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Nazarian

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to install and works well
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to install and works well, when the turn is only once, but: - Auto unlock doesn't work - If we close with 2/3 turns, it is not able to open
customer_reviews.author: Trust7

customer_reviews.title: Motor not strong enough for some knobs
customer_reviews.text: Motor was not strong enough to turn the knob on my deadbolt, so I had to return the product unfortunately. Also, when I took the adhesive off it took some of my paint off too.
customer_reviews.author: Zwi

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color and didn’t bring the batteries
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Sesame color Champagne, but it comes the silver, i know the product and its good, just the color didnt match in this order. Also it didn’t bring the batteries, I saw at the page that it comes with batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Jonnathan Renato

customer_reviews.title: Great product with great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Candy house delivers what they promise, great customer service as well as simple and sturdy product that is reliable and trustworthy. I will most definitely recommend the sesame smart lock.
customer_reviews.author: lijerome

customer_reviews.title: Liked it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Christmas present for my son and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Mine was broken- in theory it’s great!
customer_reviews.text: Mine would unlock itself. I contacted the company they they said turn knock to unlock off. Except it was already off. I emailed again and they said try logging in and out. The unit was obviously defective and they made no effort to exchange it or give me a realistic fix. I don’t want to have to keep a main feature turned off to use the product and I don’t want to come home to an unlocked house in the neighborhood I live in. So I returned it. May buy again later, I assume it was just my unit.
customer_reviews.author: vebell

customer_reviews.title: Buy WiFi attachment when purchasing !
customer_reviews.text: Front Door. Love history I can see when and who ......
customer_reviews.author: Rashied M

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm and fit my lock perfect out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm and fit my lock perfect out of the box. Set up with phone was super easy. I feel better having this on my door.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Title implies that it is able to be connected to ...
customer_reviews.text: Title implies that it is able to be connected to Alexa , google Home , etc. what they don’t tell you is you need a $70 WiFi connector and that it’s not available yet. Despite the misleading title the device works well. Auto Unlock while away and knock to unlock barely work. Overall it’s “okay” and does in fact lock the deadbolt
customer_reviews.author: Joe Devito

customer_reviews.title: ‘I found sesame smart lock is quiet handy if you are a host ...
customer_reviews.text: ‘I found sesame smart lock is quiet handy if you are a host like me. I rent out one spare room in my house. I want to manage my guest easily so I got sesame Locks. One for front door and one for the room, I grant the access for them without providing actual keys to them. when the guest left I just remove them and no worries afterwards. The best part of this is it’s super easy to install and works just well. “
customer_reviews.author: Hsiao Ying Chen

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased one through kickstarter, have not been able to keep it working for more than three weeks at a time. I have invested too much time trying to get this thing to work reliably, with no joy. Manufacturer is not much help, always have an excuse that is not their fault. I'm hitting mine with a hammer, the first time it'll make me feel good. Oh, and the wifi thing is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Tom E G

customer_reviews.title: Eats batteries, keeps dropping connection to phone
customer_reviews.text: Better off getting an August lock. This thing is too expensive to run, eats batteries like crazy. Company does not respond to questions. It keeps dropping connection to my S8+, so much that I have finally gave up and threw it away, bought an August, everything works good
customer_reviews.author: Ricketts

customer_reviews.title: It does what you need with ease, and is very dependable.
customer_reviews.text: The lock is easiest to install, as simple as the product video shows. It’s easy to set up the app, and add other users as well. It’s kinda pricey and it should come with the WiFi adapter, because that’s how you use it remotely. The widget on iPhone is simple but easy to use. The Apple Watch is fine, simple as well. It’s lacking some features but all the basics are there. For the dependability and long lasting battery, plus easy to install without tools, and uninstall when you move I give it a 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: MuEl

customer_reviews.title: May not work with all locks!
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with my door/deadbolt. The product is too deep and/or my deadbolt is too shallow, e.g. too flush with the door. This product can't reach the deadbolt to turn it. I've read that it comes with an adapter, but the one I received did not. Not sure if the adapter would have helped or not since I didn't receive one. Very disappointed in this purchase and I will be returning it. Also, pulled the cheap apartment paint off my door when I removed it, so beware the 3M tape may or may not damage the paint on your door upon removal if you live in a cheap apartment like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Dude

customer_reviews.title: Terrible wifi and software apps
customer_reviews.text: I bought the sesame with wifi adapter from the kickstarter offering. The wifi is incredibly difficult to setup and disconnects constantly. You have to be on the same network SSID to use the wifi, which means forget about opening or locking remotely, away from home. I consider this a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: A.J. Vera

customer_reviews.title: On IT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these and liked it a lot, having a dog walker and house cleaning company coming and going it was super helpful. When I discovered a bug that seemed to challenge my phone but not my service folks, Candy House had it resolved within a couple weeks--start to finish. I am impressed. I can do everything I was expecting it to do. I know some would give 4 stars (or less) for there having been a hiccup, but that they were on it so quickly means a lot giving how distant customer service can seem/be these days.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I have been with this product since it first appeared on Kickstarter. Early registrants seemed to forget that this was originally a start-up project, aka "in development". A company, to be successful, needs 2 things: a good product and good support. All products, even Apple, will occasionally need help. I've had a minor problem recently and within 2 days of posting my problem I was contacted, requesting a little more info. Two days after that my problem was fixed, and I'm back with the lock I wanted. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Janice S.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I am one of the Kickstarter backers. So I have the 1st gen. We've been using since march 2017 (2+ yrs). The wifi access is not consistent works properly 50% of the times: but to be honest been using it for 2 years and still running strong. I no longer carry my physical keys on me. Changed battery one time. Cons: sometimes it's very slow to connect to the lock. Sometimes it takes 10+ seconds to connect to the lock. Or have to keep close and re open the app to get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Therefore a retrofit of the sesame was perfect to make our patio door safe and autorelock to ...
customer_reviews.text: Our patio door would not accept new deadbolts because of the metal framing and top and bottom lags. Therefore a retrofit of the sesame was perfect to make our patio door safe and autorelock to prevent our toddler from accessing the pool. Auto relock works perfectly and integration with smartthings and alexa has been seamless. Also the customer service issues i've had have all been solved within a day. Excellent job guys!
customer_reviews.author: Punja P.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing and a complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: As one of the original backers of Sesame's Kickstarter I was one of the first to receive my lock. Support for the app is very lacking but it works most of the time. The big issue I have is that just after a year the lock quit working. Seems to have a stripped gear or the motor is to week to actually unlock my door. Very disappointing and a complete waste of money. Put your money into a brand that is tested and a fully fleshed out product.
customer_reviews.author: Tate Sonnier

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Bluetooth addition to a normal deadbolt lock.
customer_reviews.text: I have two Sesame locks. I have had the older of the two locks for 2 or 3 years since Sesame's Kickstarter campaign. My family and I have used this lock thousands of times (4 family members have access), it has always worked great. The batteries last a long time with the adapter it works over WiFi/the internet. I am shocked the reviews aren't better.
customer_reviews.author: Phil128398

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and keeps getting new features!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Sesame Smartlock and Wi-Fi module a year ago -- it has never failed me! I let people in remotely, works with Google Home so I can lock and unlock with my voice. They are constantly improving the app and adding new features. Also, they respond quickly if you send them an email. Easy to install and easy to set up. Don't hesitate to buy it. Buy the WiFi module too, it's worth it. Then it's always connected to the internet and you can unlock it from anywhere in the world.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Jacobowitz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lock
customer_reviews.text: I can’t describe how amazing is this lock! It’s working like crazy! Easy use, comfortable use, battery life as they describe 500 day+, I love this lock buy one now don’t wait, highly recommended, Lock your door with many ways, Siri, Google, Amazon echo, apps. Can be work on almost all kind of locks. Supper fast installation
customer_reviews.author: Bassam M. J. Almutawa

customer_reviews.title: Leave home without your keys!
customer_reviews.text: An incredible product that's easy to use, install, and oh, forget your keys at home. This lock is super smart. Definitely get the wifi module, it's much easier to use with it, and Alexa support is neat! Customer service is also quick to respond.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Baill

customer_reviews.title: its garbage don't get this
customer_reviews.text: its garbage don't get this. used it for less than a year and started to showing problem after 6 months of uses. of course i sent them an email for help but it wasn't help and they starting to ignore.
customer_reviews.author: Min lee

customer_reviews.title: Love love this lock
customer_reviews.text: Love love this lock!! Just wish I could check to see if it were locked when I was away from my wifi or unlock door where ever I was.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Gayle

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage
customer_reviews.text: Avoid this unsupported disaster that spawned from a failed Kickstarter project. They are several years overdue on their promises and seem to hope that the backers don't use Amazon. looks great but is completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Oisin Mcguigan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great product easy to install but without any prior warning after I couldnt unlock it it was giving me error battery is low I had to pay the locksmith $200 to come to open the door. I wish I would get warning sooner so I could change the battery Panasonic cr123a if u are buying this product buy extra battery and always keep the key with you too. I only used it for 4 months before get locked out due to lack of battery.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K.

customer_reviews.title: A lot of problems with Android. Battery lasts weeks
customer_reviews.text: From day 1, I had connection problems with my pixel 3. The battery life is horrible, lasts weeks! Last time I used it, updated the firmware and would never connect to my Android device. I just gave up with this
customer_reviews.author: Humberto Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Works great easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: The product works great, easy to install - operates my 5 bars steal door without a problem. Connectivity is great and their support is amazing - I got defective WiFi dongle and it was replaced in a matter of days. I am really happy.
customer_reviews.author: buff

customer_reviews.title: Nice work!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the reliability of this and the rapid response of support. Will likely by more for my rental properties. It can lag a bit to connect on wifi, but this could partly be due to my network.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Schlage z wave lock costs less than 180 and if you have a z wave hub you can connect like 40 locks
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine directly from Candy House and was originally told the wifi access point could support multiple locks but it cant. it also took a year to receive the wifi access point. the lock costs 150 and the wifi costs $70. The Schlage z wave lock costs less than 180 and if you have a z wave hub you can connect like 40 locks. if you bought 2 schlage locks and a smartthings hub it would be $410 but if you bought 2 sesame locks and 2 wifi hubs it would cost $440. There are better locks out there.
customer_reviews.author: Homer

product_meta.title: Sesame Smart Lock, Google Home, Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, IFTTT Enabled, Smart Home, New Gen 2 Technology
feature_bullets: NEW AND IMPROVED: Sesame 2.0 includes a built-in adjustable gripper and stronger motor. No more fumbling with detachable adjuster! And with the new motor, Sesame can now handle hard-to-turn locks.
SHARE ACCESS: Let your friends lock and unlock your door with their phones! No more keys under mats or memorizing codes; friends and family will have access during approved times.
VIEW HISTORY LOG: Know who’s been locking and unlocking your door - every action taken by Sesame is logged in your app, so you can keep tabs on who’s been in and out!
AUTO-LOCK AND AUTO-UNLOCK: Let Sesame welcome you back by auto-unlocking the door, and keep you safe by auto-locking the door behind you.
INSTALLS IN SECONDS: Simply install Sesame over your existing deadbolt lock and suddenly you have a smart lock. No tools, no handyman, no hassle.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars115 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
